creator: Ellis Parker Butler
description:
LibriVox recording of Ellis Parker Butler Short Story Collection, Vol 1 by Ellis Parker Butler.
Read in English by KirksVoice
Ellis Parker Butler was an American author. He was the author of more than 30 books and more than 2,000 stories and essays. These are eight of his humorous short stories about life. - Summary by kirk202
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.

Download M4B (183MB)
subject: librivox; audiobooks;humor; reflexions on aging
